steps.text: Create your character, pick any gift
Proceed forward and find the Ashen Estus Flask on a corpse
Defeat Iudex Grundyr to receive 3000 souls and Coiled Sword
Kill Sword Master Saber to get 2000 souls, Uchigatana, Master's Attire and Master's Gloves
Enter inside Firelink Shrine
Talk to Andre and exhaust his dialog to receive the Hurrah! gesture
Talk to the Shrine Handmaid and exhaust her dialog
Exhaust the Shrine Handmaid dialog
Use the Coiled Sword at the Firelink bonfire and travel to the High Wall of Lothric. You will receive the Rest gesture from sitting at the bonfire for the first time
Get an Estus Shard from the anvil
Get the Cell Key from a corpse
Use the Cell Key to unlock the door to Greirat cell and exhaust his dialog. Accept his request and receive the Blue Tearstone ring
Travel back to Firelink Shrine and exhaust the dialog of Greirat
Talk to Leonhard and exhaust his dialog
Travel back to the High Wall of Lothric and defeat Vordt of the Boreal Valley to receive 3000 souls and Soul of Boreal Valley Vordt
Talk to Emma and exhaust her dialog to get the Way of the Blue covenant item and the Small Lothric Banner
Go back to the boss room and raise the banner beyond the door
Talk to Yoel and exhaust his dialog
Find the Estus Shard on a corpse near the burning tree
Find Loretta's Bone on a corpse hung outside of the burning tree
Find the Fire Clutch ring on a corpse behind the gallows
Find the Fire Clutch ring on a corpse behind the gallows.
Make sure you're embered and kill Mad Invader Hodrick near the Dilapidated Bridge bonfire
Find Eygon and exhaust his dialog
Make sure you're light and your HP is full and fall down the pit behind Eygon.
Kill the Giant Rat to get the Bloodbite Ring
Find Irina and exhaust her dialog to receive the Prayer gesture
Find the Warriors of Sunlight covenant item.
Find Siegward inside the white church and exhaust his dialog
Find the Giant who shoots arrows and make peace
While coming down from talking to the giant, drop on the ledge to talk to Siegward again and exhaust his dialog
Fight the miniboss and the speak to Siegward again to receive the Toast gesture
Siegward will start sleeping, talk to him again to get the Sleep gesture
Get a Pale Tongue from a hanging corpse
Get the Northern Armor set from the other hanging corpse
Get the Flynn's Ring on a corpse on the roof
Drop down the tower and get 3 pieces of the Mirrah Armor set
Get the Chloranthy Ring from another corpse nearby
Get the Flame Stoneplate Ring from a hanging corpse by the enemy with a cage on his back
Enter the cage on the back of that enemy to get the Mound Makers covenant item
Get the Cleric Armor set from a corpse
Get the Mortician's Ashes' from a corpse
Get the Undead Bone Shard from a corpse on the separated patch of land
Travel back to Firelink Shrine and talk to Cornyx
Talk to Greirat and give him Loretta's Bone
Travel to Firelink Shrine from Firelink Shrine to reload the zone
Talk to Cornyx again to get the Welcome gesture
Talk to Greirat again to get the Curl Up gesture
Travel to Firelink Shrine from Firelink Shrine to reload the zone again
Talk to Greirat and exhaust his dialog and then send him to pillage
Travel to Dilapidated Bridge bonfire and kill the Curse-Rotten Greatwood boss to get 7000 souls, Transposing Kiln and Soul of the Rotted Greatwood
After the boss fight, get to the Road of Sacrifices bonfire.
